actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to encourage domestic advanced manufacturing of critical drugs and devices in order to address economic, health, and security concerns, combat shortages of critical drugs and devices, and promote increased domestic diversification of, and independence from foreign reliance on, pharmaceutical and medical device supply chains.
short_title: Help Onshore Manufacturing Efficiencies for Drugs and Devices Act
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
Emergency medical services and trauma care

titles.title: Help Onshore Manufacturing Efficiencies for Drugs and Devices Act
Help Onshore Manufacturing Efficiencies for Drugs and Devices Act

A bill to encourage domestic advanced manufacturing of critical drugs and devices in order to address economic, health, and security concerns, combat shortages of critical drugs and devices, and promote increased domestic diversification of, and independence from foreign reliance on, pharmaceutical and medical device supply chains.
